title: um was i naughty?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: so was i only getting the icon?

replies.body: We're giving out gifts to anyone both naughty or nice, but there's a lot of accounts so it's going to take some time.  Stay up to date through our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Not everything will be received at once, so hang tight!
